thread.title: Marc Benioff on Inequality in an Age of Innovation

author: Marc Benioff
title: Marc Benioff on Inequality in an Age of Innovation
text:
We are living through an extraordinary moment in world history—a Fourth Industrial Revolution in which nanotechnologies, robotics, quantum computing, autonomous vehicles and artificial intelligence are transforming our economies, societies and daily lives.
There is, however, a dark side. I’m increasingly worried that even as these technologies deliver incredible benefits to some, this wave of change will leave behind hundreds of millions of people around the world and exacerbate the dangerous inequalities that already plague...
